data.title: “Reagan, Trump, Fauci & Tupac” – The PBD Podcast LIVE with Dennis Quaid
data.meta_description: In this episode of the PBD Podcast, Patrick Bet-David hosts a one-of-a-kind sitdown with legendary actor Dennis Quaid, star of the upcoming biopic "Reagan."
data.text:
In this special episode of the PBD Podcast, Patrick Bet-David is joined by a live audience for a one-of-a-kind sitdown with legendary actor Dennis Quaid, star of the upcoming biopic “Reagan,” which tells the story of one of the country’s most historic presidents. After an advanced screening of the movie made available exclusively to Valuetainment, Quaid talked about the liberal bias in Hollywood, the threat of EMP attacks against the United States, and the parallels between Ronald Reagan’s story and the modern political landscape.

Learn more about the 2024 Vault Conference and secure your ticket today!

Here are some of the highlights and standout moments from this special live event:

1. “Being Told What To Think” – Dennis Quaid SLAMS Hollywood’s WOKE Policies & DEI Disney

Patrick and Dennis Quaid talk about how Hollywood is losing touch with general audiences as they grow more political and how it’s inevitable that the movie industry moves out of California.

2. “White Light Experience” – Dennis Quaid Shares His Struggles With Cocaine, Rehab & Finding Jesus

Quaid tells Patrick about his struggle with substance abuse and rehab, and how that journey led him to find God.

Subscribe to PBD’s YouTube channel today for every episode LIVE or On Demand!

3. “We Ate Chinese Food” – Tupac Brought Dennis Quaid to Tears While Filming “Gang Related”

Patrick asks Dennis Quaid about his relationship with Tupac while shooting a movie together, Dennis gets emotional.

4. “They Work For US!” – Dennis Quaid BLASTS U.S. Government For JFK & Trump Assassination Secrets

Dennis has a hilarious response when Partick asks him if he trusts the government! They get into events like the Trump and JFK assassination attempts.

5. “The Next 9/11” – Dennis Quaid SOUNDS THE ALARM On EMPs, Solar Flares & U.S. Grid Vulnerabilities

Dennis Quaid brings up the possibility of weapons that can disable the electrical grid of the United States, this endangers the lives of millions of Americans.

6. “I Miss My Brother” – Dennis Quaid Opens Up About His Brother Randy Quaid

Patrick Bet-David asks Dennis Quaid where his creative side comes from…and it turns out that it might run in the family.
